context_of_use: This use case allows customers and admins to view and download reports for monitoring and analysis.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: Access to reports for personal analysis
admin: Ability to monitor business performance through reports
description: Allow customers and admins to view sales and other reports for monitoring and analysis.
preconditions: User has permission to view reports
postconditions: User successfully views the requested reports
User can download reports if required
assumptions: Users have the necessary permissions to access reports
Reports are available in the system
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to view and download reports.
The system shall allow admins to view sales reports.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of reports available for viewing
main_flow: 1. Customer or admin requests to view reports → System displays available reports.
2. User selects a report to view → System presents the report details.
3. User opts to download the report → System initiates the download process.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 1): If the user does not have permission to view reports, then the system displays an error message.
